mil3.6.6:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yo ca matari mataya rodati, yo ca dhammapemena rodati, ubhinnam tesam rodantanam kassa assu bhesajjam, kassa na bhesajjan”ti?
mil3.6.6:1.3: “Ekassa kho, maharaja, assu ragadosamohehi samalam unham, ekassa pitisomanassena vimalam sitalam.
mil3.6.6:1.4: Yam kho, maharaja, sitalam, tam bhesajjam, yam unham, tam na bhesajjan”ti.
